Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content: You're getting it.  Noone liked my three phase story huh?

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content:
For a simple campaign mode.
3 phases....
1 - Establish a basecamp, secure resources and destroy the enemies. 
2 - Find and release the Dragon(Komodo) to fight for your side
3 - Retake the enemies base and save the queen?
Top scores can be defined by time?
Also by completeness?
Salvaging as you mentioned "Bred orcs" or building skins perhaps purchased with extra resources after missions.

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content: It should be fun and engaging for 15 - 60 minutes.   We aren't looking to hook people up to 100 hours a game (yet üòÄ )

Author: TwilightPunkster K64#7533
Content: ah, well, that would be a campaign, at this point, just polishing the look and feel

Author: TwilightPunkster K64#7533
Content: most likely I'll play this 100 hours

Author: FishyGuts#5085
